https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1nvCTgD99uDdbJTpnPMhWd32rK3.jpg A documentary about Michael Brody Jr., a 21-year-old hippie millionaire who in 1970 promised to give away his $25M inheritance in an effort to usher in a new era of world peace. Dear Mr. Brody
